description:
Don't have time to learn Excel? Sick of going to these day courses on Excel and can't apply what you learnt at your workplace?

This course is for you.

Basic Excel 2013 in 60 Minutes is a crush course on Excel for you to use Excel for work, study or your daily life. This course is broken down into 3 basic elements of why we use Excel:

  1. Enter and store information and data
  2. Analyses and calculate
  3. Present your findings in graphics, infographics or as part of a report

From the most basic functions of Excel 2013, I am going to explain how we can use Excel and give you all the tricks you require to start using Excel.

This course is about learning by doing - you will be able to follow what I do in the videos. There will also be sample datasets and exercises for you to complete.

As the course title suggests, the video components of this course is condensed to about 60 minutes to give you all the basic knowledge of Excel. The course is jammed packed with information though. We will go through materials such as:

  • The Excel interface
  • How to quickly enter information and move information around
  • Format your tables to look professional
  • Get your spreadsheet ready for printing
  • Calculate using basic formulas
  • Use Pivot tables for analysis
  • Create professional graphs and infographics
So.. without further delay, let's get started!
title: Excel 2013 Essentials for Beginners
